description: We’re looking for a Frontend Developer who values user experience, performance and accessibility. Through our enduring interest in how people use our products, Blogr embraces a model of software development that is iterative and gradual. Like high-performance engines, our products are built through a process of continuous refinement (usually on two week release cycles). We’re looking for someone who is comfortable embodying this approach.

requirements.content: You will be responsible for writing and debugging your code while writing your own unit tests. We are looking for self-motivated developers who are interested in learning and can quickly pick up new technologies. We’re a relatively small team in a stable yet fast growing company and would love for you to join us.
items: Experience in JavaScript software development, preferably in a product company
Experience with React and state management libraries (such as Redux or Mobx)
Understand cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
English language fluency, excellent communication skills

role.content: In this role, you are part of our Product team comprised of Frontend & Backend Developers, UX & UI Specialists and Product Owners. You'll work on mission critical projects from the first day on, support other engineers, share your knowledge with your colleagues, and contribute to agile projects.
items: Help define our software engineering culture
Write high quality software for the frontend
Proactively solve the problems most important to the business

description: Are you a skilled Software Developer with a passion for creating robust and scalable server-side applications? Join us at Blogr, where you'll have the opportunity to contribute to the development of mission-critical projects and collaborate with a dynamic team.

requirements.content: We're seeking candidates with strong expertise in server-side development, experience with database technologies, and the ability to write clean and maintainable code. Excellent problem-solving skills and effective communication are essential.
items: Proven experience as a Software Developer
Familiarity with database technologies (e.g., MongoDB, PostgreSQL)
Knowledge of RESTful API design principles

role.content: As a Software Developer, you'll be an integral part of our Product team, collaborating with frontend developers, UX/UI specialists, and product owners. You'll have the opportunity to contribute to the design and implementation of scalable and efficient backend systems.
items: Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate user-facing elements
Contribute to the architecture and design of backend systems
Troubleshoot and resolve issues in a timely manner

description: Join our team as a Software Engineer, where you'll play a crucial role in designing and developing intuitive and user-friendly software solutions. If you have a passion for creating high-quality code and solving complex problems, we want to hear from you!

requirements.content: We're seeking candidates with strong experience in software development, proficiency in multiple programming languages, and a deep understanding of software architecture principles. Excellent communication and collaboration skills are essential.
items: Proven experience as a Software Engineer

role.content: As a Software Engineer, you'll work closely with cross-functional teams to design and implement innovative software solutions. You'll have the opportunity to contribute to the full software development lifecycle, from concept to deployment.
items: Design and implement innovative software solutions
Contribute to the full software development lifecycle
Optimize code for performance and scalability

items: Proven experience as a Software Developer
Commitment to writing clean and maintainable code

role.content: As a Software Developer, you'll work closely with cross-functional teams to develop and maintain high-quality software solutions. You'll have the opportunity to contribute to code reviews, collaborate with UX/UI specialists, and proactively address software development challenges.

description: Join us as a Software Engineer at Blogr, where you'll have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge software projects and contribute to the success of our products. If you have a passion for software development and a desire to create innovative solutions, we want to hear from you!

requirements.content: We're seeking candidates with strong experience in software development, proficiency in programming languages, and a deep understanding of software architecture. Excellent problem-solving skills and effective communication are essential.
